title: KIP-02: Next Big Feature
body:
**We hear you!** 
Here are some of the most requested features the community has been asking for:

- Chatbox ⭐⭐⭐ 

- Allow users to set a background image behind the TradingView (TV) charts (think whitelabel) ⭐ 

- Portfolio tracker + Show your trades on chart ⭐⭐ 

- RPG system integration - Rarity ⭐ 

‎‎‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎
-- ⭐⭐⭐ = Hardest & longest timeframe to develop
-- ⭐⭐= Medium difficulty / timeframe
-- ⭐= Easiest / shortest timeframe
 

*Chatbox* 
The chatbox would be holders only initially. After that, we would make a free room, and likely a whale room too. It would also be simple to start, as we slowly add on more features. 

*Portfolio Tracker*
The portfolio tracker would be a simple version to start. Functions include: Add buy/sell orders of your favorite Kek.tool tokens, track profit loss ratio, output total portfolio worth. 

*Other* 
Custom TradingView Background image, Rarity integration, and show your trades on chart are pretty self-explanatory.  Rarity integration would likely have its own sidebar icon which then iframes over.

 

**You guys decide which new feature we start working on!**
author: 0x08fBa4dEcc0e45431b8765856E285d1013777B12
